import sys

read = sys.stdin.read
readline = sys.stdin.readline
readlines = sys.stdin.readlines
sys.setrecursionlimit(10 ** 9)
INF = 1 << 60
MOD = 1000000007


def main():
    A, B = list(map(int, readline().split()))

    if B % A == 0:
        print((A + B))
    else:
        print((B - A))

    return


def __starting_point():
    main()
